attributes.action: Change the amount of people for wedding and funerals
attributes.additional_details: The amount of money lost to business is unbelievable, there has been enough business gone under all ready with out losing any more we need to build economy up quickly so we can thrive again
attributes.background: Just bring up the amount of people for wedding and funerals up for each of the date surgested to15+, 30+ and 50+ at LEAST or all depends on the size of the venue, even get tested before, IT DOSE NOT MAKE SENCE to go to 30 to 10.000 in a day

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about limits to the number of people who can attend weddings and funerals, but we're not sure what changes you'd like the Government to make to these rules.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Permit larger weddings based on guests testing negative for COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550498

Review wedding restrictions monthly: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552244

Introduce rapid Covid-19 testing for weddings to permit close contact of guests: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561608

Extend the limit for weddings to 30 with COVID 19 restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552039

Weddings to be allowed from the 17th of May with a maximum of 150: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576593

Allow up to 30 people to attend a wake: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551483

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
